mapper.select: SELECT film.film_name AS filmName, filmInfo.film_en_name AS filmEnName, film.img_address AS imgAddress, film.film_score AS score, filmInfo.film_score_num AS scoreNum, film.film_box_office AS totalBox, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(show_name SEPARATOR ',') FROM mooc_cat_dict_t t WHERE FIND_IN_SET( t.UUID, ( SELECT REPLACE ( TRIM(BOTH '#' FROM film_cats), '#', ',' ) FROM mooc_film_t t WHERE t.UUID = film.UUID ) ) ) AS info01, CONCAT( ( SELECT t.show_name FROM mooc_cat_dict_t t WHERE film.UUID = t.UUID ), '/', filmInfo.film_length ) AS info02, CONCAT( film.film_time, ' ', ( SELECT source.show_name FROM mooc_source_dict_t source WHERE film.UUID = source.UUID ), '上映' ) AS info03 FROM mooc_film_t film, mooc_film_info_t filmInfo WHERE film.UUID = filmInfo.film_id AND film.film_name LIKE #{filmName}

SELECT film.film_name AS filmName, filmInfo.film_en_name AS filmEnName, film.img_address AS imgAddress, film.film_score AS score, filmInfo.film_score_num AS scoreNum, film.film_box_office AS totalBox, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(show_name SEPARATOR ',') FROM mooc_cat_dict_t t WHERE FIND_IN_SET( t.UUID, ( SELECT REPLACE ( TRIM(BOTH '#' FROM film_cats), '#', ',' ) FROM mooc_film_t t WHERE t.UUID = film.UUID ) ) ) AS info01, CONCAT( ( SELECT t.show_name FROM mooc_cat_dict_t t WHERE film.UUID = t.UUID ), '/', filmInfo.film_length ) AS info02, CONCAT( film.film_time, ' ', ( SELECT source.show_name FROM mooc_source_dict_t source WHERE film.UUID = source.UUID ), '上映' ) AS info03 FROM mooc_film_t film, mooc_film_info_t filmInfo WHERE film.UUID = filmInfo.film_id AND film.UUID = #{uuid}
